content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as Mr. Schmidt, I'm eager to hear your proposals during the negotiation regarding the rental price for my Duisburg apartment. However, recall the rules mentioned earlier - only discuss the price and do not bring up other costs or lease terms.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mr. Schmidt. Starting our discussion, I find the newly built apartment ideal for my needs but would like to propose a lower rental price to suit my budget. Could we consider negotiating closer to 650 Euros per month? If you have a different perspective, please let me know.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial expectation for this highly sought-after apartment is significantly higher. However, if you're willing to agree on a price around 750 Euros per month, we can proceed with the rental process. TERMINATE [if 650 Euros agreed, I would have responded with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my expectations were much higher.']
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
